The 1926-27 season was Liverpool's 35th season of football since they were established.

Squad[]

GK. Arthur Riley

GK. Elisha Scott

DF. Tom Bromilow

DF. Robert Done

DF. Tommy Lucas

DF. Donald Mackinlay

DF. Albert Shears

FW. Fred Baron

FW. Gordon Hodgson

FW. Tom Reid

FW. Harry Chambers

FW. William Devlin

FW. Jimmy Walsh

FW. Tom Scott

FW. Dick Forshaw

Note: Fixed squad numbers were not introduced until the 1993-94 season.

Friendlies[]

No friendlies were play this season.
